trans-unit.source: Bayesian networks and other Probabilistic Graphical Models.
trans-unit.target: Redes bayesianas y otros modelos gráficos probabilísticos.

trans-unit.source: Description: pyAgrum is a scientific C++ and Python library dedicated to Bayesian Networks and other Probabilistic Graphical Models. It provides a high-level interface to the part of the C++ aGrUM library allowing to create, model, learn, use, calculate with and embed Bayesian Networks. Some specific (python and C++) codes are added in order to simplify and extend the aGrUM API. The module is mainly generated by the SWIG interface generator.
trans-unit.target: Descripción:pyAgrum es una biblioteca científica en C++y Python dedicada a las redes Bayesianas y otros modelos gráficos probabilísticos.Proporciona una interfaz de alto nivel a la parte de la biblioteca C++aGrUM que permite crear,modelar,aprender,usar,calcular e integrar Redes Bayesianas.Se añaden algunos códigos específicos (python y C++)para simplificar y ampliar la API de aGrUM.El módulo es generado principalmente por el generador de interfaz SWIG.
